code: @Override public void validate(ProblemReporter problemReporter) {     if (getMetadata().isStatic()) {         // static @Bean methods have no constraints to validate -> return immediately         return.     }     if (this.configurationClass.getMetadata().isAnnotated(Configuration.class.getName())) {         if (!getMetadata().isOverridable()) {             // instance @Bean methods within @Configuration classes must be overridable to accommodate CGLIB             problemReporter.error(new NonOverridableMethodError()).         }     } }
